abstract: Saudi Arabian appeals court commutes sentence of death by stoning for Sri Lankan maid convicted of adultery to three years in prison.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court has commuted a sentence of death by stoning for a Sri Lankan woman convicted of adultery.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Condemned Maid Spared From Death Sentence
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Saudi Arabia: Condemned Maid Spared

snippet: An appeals court has commuted a sentence of death by stoning for a Sri Lankan woman convicted of adultery.
